content: For DSN, toggle mail.dsn.always_request_on to true in Settings/General/Config. editor. Settings/General/Reading & Display, for return receipts.

content: Try this: - highlight account in left column of main view - right click and select 'subscribe' to see if the missing folders appear.

content: I've done this and tried hitting the refresh button. There are no folders at all under the Folder List tab, so none to subscribe to.
creator: sherri.tombarge

content: What are your incoming server settings - server name, port #, etc.
creator: davidsk

content: I'm not sure how to find incoming, but I think they are the same as outgoing: Server name: smtp.gmail.com Port: 465 Connection security: SSL/TLS Authentication method: OAuth2 User name: sherri.tombarge@svswcd.org
creator: sherri.tombarge

content: highlight account in left side of main window, rightclick and select 'settings'. on next pane, click 'server settings' in left pane. If it says 'smtp.gmail.com' that is the reason you are not receiving messages, as that is the outgoing server, not the incoming one. Please post what you see. thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: It says smtp.gmail.com. What should it say?
creator: sherri.tombarge

content: My first guess is imap.gmail.com, port 993, SSL/TLS, authentication as OAUTH2. If that is not correct, I suggest asking whomever gave you the work account information.
creator: davidsk

content: I will try this. I cannot do it now because it requires a restart, and I have to wait till a little later to reboot the computer. If it doesn't work, though, there is no one here who knows the answer. I do have access to the admin console if anyone can tell me how to find out the answer.
creator: sherri.tombarge

content: A comment: this does not require rebooting computer, but a restart of Thunderbird.
creator: davidsk

content:
Hi Juliette, This is a server side error on Google's side. Can you please try again after some time?

Have you tried to enable your cookies in your Thunderbird (Privacy & Security settings) Probably it will be enough to store it for accounts.google.com

Have a fantastic day!
creator: shopov.bogomil

content: Worked perfectly when abling the cookies! Thank you!
creator: juliette.vanneuville
